inputs.name: inspecForceInstall
inputs.label: Force Install
inputs.helpMarkdown: Force installation, even if InSpec is already installed

inputs.name: useSudo
inputs.label: Use Sudo
inputs.helpMarkdown: Use Sudo to perform installation. Only valid on Linux build agents.

inputs.name: inspecChannel
inputs.label: Channel
inputs.helpMarkdown: Channel from which InSpec should be installed.

inputs.name: inspecVersion
inputs.label: InSpec Version
inputs.helpMarkdown: Verson to install. iI not supplied it will install the latest version, and if an iteration number is not specified, it will grab the latest available iteration. Partial version numbers are also acceptable

inputs.name: chefInstallScriptDownloadURLWindows
inputs.label: Chef Install Script Download URL - Windows
inputs.helpMarkdown: This is the URL to the script that will be downloaded to install the InSpec. This for Windows build agents

inputs.name: chefInstallScriptDownloadURLLinux
inputs.label: Chef Install Script Download URL - Linux / MacOS
inputs.helpMarkdown: This is the URL to the script that will be downloaded to install the InSpec. This for Linux or MacOS build agents

inputs.name: downloadsFolderWindows
inputs.label: Windows Downloads Folder
inputs.helpMarkdown: Folder into which downloads are placed. If not set of the path does not exist this will be C:\Windows\Temp

inputs.name: downloadsFolderLinux
inputs.label: Linux Downloads Folder
inputs.helpMarkdown: Folder into which downloads are placed. If not set or the path does not exist this will be /tmp
